data.name: CompanyEdit_aspx_cphContent_lblEmail
data.value: Enter other email than the one you use to register/login.

data.name: MeterElectricityAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblAlertAfter
data.value: The tool will send you a reminder if the meter reading is not taken on the due date. Enter how many days after the due date you would like to be reminded.

data.name: MeterElectricityAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblAlertBefore
data.value: Choose how many days in advance you would like to be reminder about reading the meter

data.name: MeterElectricityAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblAlertOnStart
data.value: Tick the box if you would like to receive a message when the 1st reading is due.

data.name: MeterElectricityAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblDescription
data.value: Enter any useful information here such as the meter location, or where the supply is going.

data.name: MeterElectricityAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblFrequencyQuantity
data.value: Input here how often you will read the meter. If once a month, enter 1 and choose month in the from the INTERVAL drop down menu.

data.name: MeterElectricityAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblFrequencyUnits
data.value: Select interval of meter readings from the drop down menu. Select "Period" if you want to enter only one value to cover the entire timespan.

data.name: MeterElectricityAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblIdentification
data.value: Enter the physical meter serial number (meter ID) or others meters identification here.

data.name: MeterElectricityAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblInitialDate
data.value: Enter here the date the meter is installed.

data.name: MeterElectricityAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblInitialReading
data.value: Enter the 1st meter reading when the meter is installed.

data.name: MeterElectricityAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblIsPhysical
data.value: Tick the box if the meter is installed on site. Un-tick the box if the meter reading is extracted from the bill for example.

data.name: MeterElectricityAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblUnits
data.value: This is the unit measured by the meter, usually kWh.

data.name: MeterFuelAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblDescription
data.value: Enter any useful information about the meter, such as whether it is a physical meter or whether it is a stationary (eg boiler, furnace, etc.) or mobile (eg vehicle) combustion source.

data.name: MeterFuelAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblIdentification
data.value: Enter here the identification of the meter or the stationariy or mobile combustion source.

data.name: MeterFuelAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblUnits
data.value: Select the unit of measurement.

data.name: MeterFuelLoadAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblLoadDate
data.value: Enter the date of the record.

data.name: MeterFuelLoadAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblLoadTypes
data.value: Select the fuel type.

data.name: MeterFuelLoadAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblLoadUnits
data.value: Select the unit of measurement.

data.name: MeterFuelLoadAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblLoadValue
data.value: Load value.

data.name: Meters_aspx_cphContent_lblMeters
data.value: Select the meter type to access each meter section.

data.name: MeterTransportAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblDescription
data.value: Enter any useful information of the transport/s.

data.name: MeterTransportAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblIdentification
data.value: Enter here the identification of the transport/s.

data.name: MeterTransportAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblUnits
data.value: Select the unit of measurement.

data.name: MeterTransportLoadAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblLoadDistanceHeaderUnit
data.value: Select the unit of measurement.

data.name: MeterTransportLoadAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblLoadDistanceHeaderValue
data.value: Load value.

data.name: MeterTransportLoadAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblLoadHeaderDate
data.value: Enter the date of the record.

data.name: MeterTransportLoadAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblLoadHeaderPlateNumber
data.value: Enter here the transport identification number or other identification of the transport.

data.name: MeterTransportLoadAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblLoadHeaderTypes
data.value: Select the transport type.

data.name: MeterWasteAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblDescription
data.value: Enter any useful information from the waste source/s of waste generation, types, characterization, etc.

data.name: MeterWasteAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblIdentification
data.value: Enter here the identification of the waste source/s generation.

data.name: MeterWasteAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblUnits
data.value: Select the unit of measurement.

data.name: MeterWasteLoadAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblLoadDate
data.value: Enter the date of the record.

data.name: MeterWasteLoadAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblLoadTypes
data.value: Select the waste type.

data.name: MeterWasteLoadAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblLoadUnits
data.value: Select the unit of measurement.

data.name: MeterWasteLoadAdd_aspx_cphContent_lblLoadValue
data.value: Load value.
